transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Kya haal hai? Good afternoon. Mr. Rahul baat kar rahe hai, Sri Har Trading se.
Executive: Haan ji sir boliye.
Customer: Haan Rahul sir actually main Naveen baat kar raha tha IndiaMART head office Noida se, kaise hai aap?
Executive: Bas badhiya sir aap bataiye.
Customer: Haan Rahul sir actually mere paas ek video meeting ki request aapki aayi aapke end se aayi thi.
Customer: Aap video meeting karna chahte the hamare saath?
Executive: Video meeting to madam ko daal di thi actually mera jo concern hai wo concern ye hai ki jo meri website ke saath mein wo Zoho ki mail ID dijiye na.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Usme login nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Login nahi kar pa rahe hai aapko user ID password mila hai uska?
Customer: Wo sab mil gaya tha aur regular chal raha tha actually maine kya hai mobile change kiya tha abhi.
Customer: To mobile app mein pehle log thi ab naye tarike se jab wapas login kar raha hu to director wali ID jo hai wo to ho gayi. Fir sales, purchase aur import ye teen ID aur hai wo teeno login karne ja rahe hai na to password dalne ke baad wo OTP maang raha hai aur wo OTP usi ID pe ja raha hai jis ID ko apan login karna cha rahe hai.
Customer: Jaise sales ki ID ko login karna cha rahe hai to wo director pe nahi ja raha hai wo OTP ja raha hai seedha aapka us pe.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan. To ye problem chal rahi hai. To ye hai concern sir aapko.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Rahul sir abhi Riya se jaise aapki kal baat hui thi to shayad Riya ne aapko wo screenshot bhejne ko bola tha sir jo error aa raha hai waha pe.
Customer: Aur unhone fir uske baad kisi aur se baat hui thi unhone bhi savere bola maine ID aapki reset karwai hai.
Customer: To uske baad bhi nahi ho raha tha ye. To ab ya to system pe ek baar dekh kar ke aap karwayenge ki kaise karwayenge.
Executive: System pe hi kara lete hai sir ek baar aap online kab tak aa jayenge? 3:30 ho raha hai sir abhi.
Customer: To mujhe ek ghanta lagega abhi. Kyunki main abhi ghar se niklunga to office pahuchunga.
Executive: Okay. To Rahul sir ye 3:30 ho raha hai to 4:30 baje ek baar video meeting pe mil lete hai sir.
Customer: Haan ab jo hai video meeting pe lenge to system aa jayega us pe. To ab screen bhi share ho jayegi to aap dekh lijiyega usme.
Executive: Bilkul sir main Riya ko bolta hu aapko 4:30 baje call karengi aap free to ho jayenge sir ek ghante mein?
Customer: Haan ek ghante mein main free ho jaunga bilkul. Main abhi just abhi thodi der pehle hi main just nikla hu office se. Shayad aapka call aaya hoga pehle to main gaadi pe tha to receive nahi kar paya tha.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir aap ek ghante mein ek baar free ho jaiye 3:30 ho raha hai to ek baar 4:30 baje connect karte hai. Tab tak ke liye haan ek ghante se pehle hi free ho jaunga to madam ke mobile pe WhatsApp pe bhej dunga message to wo haan.
Executive: Unka number hai aapke paas?
Customer: Haan unka hai na.
Executive: Theek hai aur second thing sir aap jo login kar rahe hai to waha pe error dikh raha hoga na uska screenshot bhi aap bhej dijiyega.
Executive: Taki aapke login karte karte hum check bhi kara lenge ki aur koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi hai ek baar aap login karke dekh lijiyega mobile mein dikkat aa rahi hai login karne mein ya aap system pe dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Dekhiye mobile mein aa rahi hai system pe to abhi maine login kiya nahi hai. System pe to ek baar log abhi login usme bhi karke dekh lete hai to agar aisa hoga to agar mail pe bhejega to apna OTP dalna hai bas wo sirf actually kya OTP OTP agar bhejega to apan mail se hi bhejna hai to usme se login ho jayega to dalna hai wo koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai.
Customer: Matlab wo dono mein se ek jagah kahi pe bhi apna agar mail login hoga to wo kaam ho jayega to apan system pe pehle kar lete hai abhi to ho jayega.
Executive: Bilkul aap ek baar try kar lijiye agar system pe ye work kar jata hai sir to well and good hai nahi to ek baar hum try karte hai 4:30 baje jab main connect karunga agar man lijiye solve ho jata hai to aap bata to dijiyega is message mein nahi to hum 4:30 baje.
Customer: Haan main ek hai na solve dekhiye agar login ho jata hai system pe to koi issue nahi hai aur nahi to fir main waise bata dunga aur ho bhi jata hai to main madam ko bhej dunga message ki okay hai ho gaya.
Executive: Definitely sir kuch check kariega ek baar koshish karte hai 4:30 baje ke aas paas connect karenge sir. To agar problem bachi hogi to usko hum saamne saamne dekh lenge to mujhe lag raha hai thoda jyada achha hoga.
Customer: Haan nahi agar problem rehti hai to wo actually maine bhi system pe download to kar rakha hai jo jo app ka usme login kiya hua bhi hai. To ek baar aur check kar lete hai nahi hota hai to fir main wapas kar hi leta hu madam ko bhi inform.
Executive: Theek hai sir koi issue nahi hai bataiyega aap jaise hi free ho rahe hai call kar lijiyega Riya ko theek hai.
Customer: Ji bilkul bilkul. Okay theek hai sir okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to login to Zoho mail ID.

- OTP is going to the director ID.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested a video meeting at 4:30 PM.

- Customer agreed to try logging in on the system.

- Customer will send a screenshot of the error.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 4:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login issue, otp, zoho mail, video meeting
